languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, блюстители перевернули станцию вверх дном, но не нашли ни следа генетической мерзости. На вид — обычные люди, и кишки у них такие же".
"Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, блюстители перевернули станцию вверх дном, но не нашли ни следа генетической мерзости. На вид — обычные люди, и кишки у них такие же".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic anathema. They look like normal people, and their guts look exactly the same."
"Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic anathema. They look like normal people, and their guts look exactly the same."
"Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."

"Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Enforcer haben in der Station alles auf den Kopf gestellt, aber keine Hinweise auf genetische Abscheulichkeiten gefunden. Das scheinen normale Leute zu sein, und ihre Innereien sehen auch ganz normal aus."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Enforcer haben in der Station alles auf den Kopf gestellt, aber keine Hinweise auf genetische Abscheulichkeiten gefunden. Das scheinen normale Leute zu sein, und ihre Innereien sehen auch ganz normal aus."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les prévôts ont eu beau passer la station au peigne fin, ils n'ont pas décelé la moindre trace de l'aberration génétique. Les victimes ont l'air de gens ordinaires, et leurs entrailles le sont tout autant. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les prévôts ont eu beau passer la station au peigne fin, ils n'ont pas décelé la moindre trace de l'aberration génétique. Les victimes ont l'air de gens ordinaires, et leurs entrailles le sont tout autant. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los guardias han puesto la estación patas arriba, pero no han hallado ningún indicio de aberraciones genéticas. Parecen personas corrientes, y sus entrañas son igual de normales».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los guardias han puesto la estación patas arriba, pero no han hallado ningún indicio de aberraciones genéticas. Parecen personas corrientes, y sus entrañas son igual de normales».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、エンフォーサーがステーション全部をひっくり返して操作しましたが、遺伝的忌まわしきものの痕跡は見つかりませんでした。連中は見た目は普通の人間、内臓も普通のもののようです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、エンフォーサーがステーション全部をひっくり返して操作しましたが、遺伝的忌まわしきものの痕跡は見つかりませんでした。連中は見た目は普通の人間、内臓も普通のもののようです」

languages.text: “舰长大人，执法者把这座星站搜了个底朝天，但没有发现任何基因变异的痕迹。那些人看起来和正常人没有区别，内脏看起来也没有任何问题。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，执法者把这座星站搜了个底朝天，但没有发现任何基因变异的痕迹。那些人看起来和正常人没有区别，内脏看起来也没有任何问题。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, infazcılar istasyonun altını üstüne getirdi fakat hiçbir genetik sapkı izine rastlamadılar. İstasyon halkı sıradan insanlar gibi görünüyor. İç organları da normal duruyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the enforcers have turned the station upside down, but found no trace of genetic aberration. They look like normal people, and their guts look just as normal."
